ul.li:
The term icons have more colors:
Green: the term is enabled and has available seats.
Blue: the term is enabled and has no available seats, but has spots on the waitlist.
Orange: the term is enabled but has no available seats or spots on the waitlist.
Red: the term is disabled. This color is only shown in the bottom right in the Courses box and Schedules tab.

Instead of the Closed/Waitlisted tab, this version has a red warning symbol next to the name when the class or section is filled with no spots on the waitlist, or a blue warning symbol when the class is filled but has slots on the waitlist. If you cannot see the different color warning icons on your browser, hover over the icon to see which warning it is.
CRNs no longer exist due to the switch to workday.
